name: Mag Designator, Improved (ImMD-10)
description: The mag designator projects a high frequency magnetic effect to mark a target for attack. The rapid magnetic pulsing also scrambles electronic circuits and induces temporary disorientation in organic beings. Additionally, the effect shuts down magnetic equipment.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
